ConfigurationGroup.title: E-Mail Options
ConfigurationGroup.description: General setting for E-Mail transport and HTML E-Mails

EMAIL_TRANSPORT.title: E-Mail Transport Method
EMAIL_TRANSPORT.description: Defines if this server uses a local connection to sendmail or uses an SMTP connection via TCP/IP. Servers running on Windows and MacOS should change this setting to SMTP.

EMAIL_LINEFEED.title: E-Mail Linefeeds
EMAIL_LINEFEED.description: Defines the character sequence used to separate mail headers.

EMAIL_USE_HTML.title: Use MIME HTML When Sending Emails

ENTRY_EMAIL_ADDRESS_CHECK.title: Verify E-Mail Addresses Through DNS
ENTRY_EMAIL_ADDRESS_CHECK.description: Verify e-mail address through a DNS server
